name: Agent 3310 (AGO061)
description:
Agent 3310, you were sent on a special mission to retrieve the clock of sight, a special item that allows you to become invisible for a short amount of time. This prototype has a problem though... when using it, it drains all of your energy, making your muscles contract and slowing you down.

Escape the facility, Agent 3310. Don't fail us.

--- END OF TRANSMISSION ---

How to play:

WASD - 8426 - ^: Move Agent 3310
Q - Numpad 7 - RMB: Toggle cloak
E - Numpad 5 -LMB: Shoot
F - Numpad 9: Unlock/Open/Enter door
SPACE - ^ - W: Jump
Ctrl - v - S: Crouch
